title: Duplicate your database service (fork)
description: Your backup fork will be run on a new cluster.
errorCreatingService: An error occurred while duplicating (forking) your service
successCreatingService: Your service has been successfully forked
inputSourceTypeDescription: Select the restore point from which the service will be duplicated.
errorNetworkFieldMissingId: Please enter a network and subnet, or select a public network type
errorSourceTypeFieldInvalid: This restore point type is not available for this service
errorSourcePITFieldInvalidDate: The date chosen is not valid
